languages.text: "Не смею жаловаться, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Малым дворянам, как я, порой влетает за то, что заставляем господ серчать, но это даже хорошо. Так я будто бы чище и светлее изнутри, и лучше могу служить Богу-Императору, Ключ всех Судеб держащему". {n}Сотворив аквилу, Мейв поднимает на вас исполненный благоговения взгляд.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: складывает руки аквилой в конце куя

traits.locale_text: "Не смею жаловаться, звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}. То, что еды не хватает, это даже хорошо. Так я будто бы чище и светлее изнутри",{n} — застенчиво улыбается служанка.{/n} "А когда больно и холодно и раны от розг долго не заживают... снится мне наш Бог-Император, Ключ всех Судеб держащий. Будто шепчет Он мне слова утешения. Будто верит, что справлюсь". {n}Сотворив аквилу, Лидзи поднимает на вас исполненный благоговения взгляд.{/n} "Каждые солнце и луна, прожитые в муках труда, стоят мгновений этой грезы".

languages.translation_comment: складывает руки аквилой в конце куя

languages.text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не смею жаловаться, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Малым дворянам, как я, порой влетает за то, что заставляем господ серчать, но это даже хорошо. Так я будто бы чище и светлее изнутри, и лучше могу служить Богу-Императору, Ключ всех Судеб держащему". {n}Сотворив аквилу, Мейв поднимает на вас исполненный благоговения взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside, and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and raises a reverent gaze to you.{/n}

"I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

"I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Even the lack of food is good, in a way. It's like I'm cleaner and brighter on the inside." {n}Lidzy the servant smiles shyly.{/n} "And whenever I am cold and in pain and my wounds from the canings are slow to heal... our God-Emperor comes to me in my dreams, the holder of the Key to all Destinies. It is as if He whispers words of comfort to me. As if He believes I will get through this." {n}Lidzy makes the sign of the Aquila and raises a reverent gaze to you.{/n} "The fleeting moment of that dream is worth every sun and moon spent in the agony of toil."

"I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside, and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and raises a reverent gaze to you.{/n}

"I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

languages.text: “我没什么可抱怨的，来自上界的大人。像我这样的小贵族，有时可能会由于惹怒总督而遭到责罚，但在某种意义上而言，这是件好事。我认为，这可以让我的内心变得更加纯洁、光明，也可以帮助我更好地侍奉神皇，万千命运之钥的持有者。”{n}梅芙做了个双头鹰手势，虔诚地凝视着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我没什么可抱怨的，来自上界的大人。像我这样的小贵族，有时可能会由于惹怒总督而遭到责罚，但在某种意义上而言，这是件好事。我认为，这可以让我的内心变得更加纯洁、光明，也可以帮助我更好地侍奉神皇，万千命运之钥的持有者。”{n}梅芙做了个双头鹰手势，虔诚地凝视着你。{/n}

languages.text: «Jamás osaría protestar, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Los nobles de baja casta como yo solemos ser castigados por enojar a nuestros superiores, pero en cierto modo es algo bueno. Considero que me hace más limpia y pura por dentro, y me ayuda a servir mejor al Dios Emperador, el portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos». {n}Maive se persigna con la señal del Aquila y te mira con reverencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Jamás osaría protestar, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Los nobles de baja casta como yo solemos ser castigados por enojar a nuestros superiores, pero en cierto modo es algo bueno. Considero que me hace más limpia y pura por dentro, y me ayuda a servir mejor al Dios Emperador, el portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos». {n}Maive se persigna con la señal del Aquila y te mira con reverencia.{/n}

languages.text: "Şikâyet etmeye cüret edemem Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Benim gibi daha alt tabakadan soylular bazen efendilerimizi kızdırdığımız için cezalandırılırız ama bu bir bakıma iyidir. Bence bu beni içten daha temiz ve parlak yapıyor, Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan'a ve Tanrı İmparator'a daha iyi hizmet etmeme yardımcı oluyor." {n}Maive, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp saygıyla sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Şikâyet etmeye cüret edemem Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Benim gibi daha alt tabakadan soylular bazen efendilerimizi kızdırdığımız için cezalandırılırız ama bu bir bakıma iyidir. Bence bu beni içten daha temiz ve parlak yapıyor, Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan'a ve Tanrı İmparator'a daha iyi hizmet etmeme yardımcı oluyor." {n}Maive, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp saygıyla sana bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「不満などありませんわ、天の{mf|君|姫}。私のような身分の低い貴族は時々、主を怒らせて罰を受けますが、それはある意味ではいいことなのです。それは私の内側をきれいにして、より輝かしいものにし、すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの神帝陛下により良く使えることになります」{n}メイヴはアクィラの印を作り、あなたに敬けんな眼差しを向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「不満などありませんわ、天の{mf|君|姫}。私のような身分の低い貴族は時々、主を怒らせて罰を受けますが、それはある意味ではいいことなのです。それは私の内側をきれいにして、より輝かしいものにし、すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの神帝陛下により良く使えることになります」{n}メイヴはアクィラの印を作り、あなたに敬けんな眼差しを向ける。{/n}

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas à me plaindre, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Les nobles inférieurs comme moi sont parfois punis pour avoir provoqué l'ire de leurs suzerains, mais c'est une bonne chose. Je pense sincèrement que cela purifie mon âme et m'aide à mieux servir l'Empereur-Dieu, Celui qui détient la clé de tous les destins. » {n}Maive fait le signe de l'Aquila en vous lançant un regard empreint de respect.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas à me plaindre, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Les nobles inférieurs comme moi sont parfois punis pour avoir provoqué l'ire de leurs suzerains, mais c'est une bonne chose. Je pense sincèrement que cela purifie mon âme et m'aide à mieux servir l'Empereur-Dieu, Celui qui détient la clé de tous les destins. » {n}Maive fait le signe de l'Aquila en vous lançant un regard empreint de respect.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich wage es nicht, mich zu beklagen, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}. Niedere Adlige wie ich werden mitunter bestraft, weil wir unsere Herren erzürnen, aber das ist in gewisser Weise auch gut. Ich denke, es macht mich im Inneren sauberer und heller und hilft mir, dem Gottimperator besser zu dienen, der den Schlüssel zu allen Schicksalen hat." {n}Maive macht das Zeichen des Adlers und sieht dich ehrfurchtsvoll an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I dare not complain, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Lesser nobles such as myself sometimes receive punishment for angering our lords, but that is good, in a way. I think it makes me cleaner and brighter on the inside and helps me to better serve the God-Emperor, the holder of the Key to all Destinies." {n}Maive makes the sign of the Aquila and turns a reverent gaze upon you.{/n}
